tharagawaliyata ekwa sitina thawath wides kra්ridakayan 56kata da mila thiranaya wima sidu keruni.wides kridakayan meseya.basnahira:- brad hog, malan samuwel, daniyel smith, dik hanis, robin pitarsan, tim sawuthi, klint maki, kamarun bogaskandurata:- sahid ajmal, mishba ul hak, shohil thanwir, kris leyin, den jems, albi mokal, johan botha, adam woguuwa:- kris gel, umar gul, shohib malik, jems franklin, andru makdonal, kolim fargiyusan, ahamad asamuthura:- shakib al hasan, brendan telar, kewon kupar, imran farhath, fidel edwad, dewid milar, dilan di pres, samuwel badrinagenahira:- michel mash, imran nasir, tuwis brit, ahamad shahed, ben lalin, mushinikar rahim, pals sani, nasir hosenruhunu:- fahid afridi, daniyel haris, eran finch, ren haris, jerom telar, nethan maklam, reyan maklarn, richad lewiwayambaa:- asar mehemud, umar akmal, thamim ikbal, kolin ingram, kamaran roch, jems folknar, abdul rasak, brad hog.
game sita rathu deniya dakwa kilo mitar hayak pamana dura hemin karaththaya dak wu shukar siya sapa se kirawatennata wiya.

jathika sanhindiyawa pilibanda katha kirimedi jawipe widihata 1972 sakas karapu prathipaththi prakashanayen swayan nirna ayithiya piligaththa.ethanadi api adahas kale naha.bedi wenwimak.ehema thanakata thallu kirime awashyathawak thibune naha.mama adath inna sthawaraya thamayi swayan nirnaya ayithiyak.mokada minissu matha balahathkaraya patawala,anawashya widihata pidawata pathkaranawa nam minissunta ayithiya thiyenna oone thiranaya karanna anith kotasath ekka ekata innawada nadda kiyala.

kesewuwath mahinda rajapaksha mahatha janadhipathi dhurayata pathwana awasthawa wanawita mema adhikariya padu labima nisa wasa damimata niyamitha aayathanayak lesa nam kara thibuni.2001 – 2004 eksath jathika peramuna rajaya samaye kriyathmaka karamin siti “yali pubudamu shri lanka” wadasatahana yatathe mema adhikariya wasa damima sandaha wana pimbaurupath sakas kerini.mema wathawaranaya thula 2005 wasare di merata janapathi dhurayata path mahinda rajapaksha mahathata awashya wuye yali depayin nagi sitiya haki lesa mema adhikariya shakthimath kara merata niwasa wadapiliwela wegayen idiriyata genayama sandaha awashya katayuthu sampadanaya kirimaya.ada apata aadambarayen sathutuwiya haki karuna nam ema apeksha malpala ganwamin niwasak nomathi laksha sankhyatha pirisakata pilisaranak wemin itha shakthimath lesa thama mehewara thawa thawath pulul kirimata jathika niwasa sanwardhana adhikariyata hakiyawa labi thibimayi.niwasa kshethraya wenuwen mema adhikariya wadima aayojanaya sidu kala wasara lesa 2011 wasara handinwima niwaradiya.

pakshata ho paksha nayakathwayata athi janatha kamaththata muwawi janathawa athara apriya apekshakayanta mathiwarana jayaganimata kewala kotatasha kumaya thula mahagu prasthawak atha.apekshakayata athi wirodhaya abhibhawa pakshayata ho paksha nayakayata athi pakshapathithwaya prabhala wita chandadayakayata athiwikalpaya wanne thama akamathi apekshakayaku dinawimata dayakawima nisa ewan deshapalakayan thamanta athi mahajana wirodhaya thuttuwakatawath mayin nokara pahasuwen parlimenthuwata pathwana athara, apekshakayekuta thama parlimenthu gamana wenuwen janathawadiwa kriya kirima nowa paksha nayakaya hodin thabaganima pamanak hodatama pramanawath bawin mewan mahajana niyojithayangen janatha sewayak ituweda yanna pawa sakasahithaya.namuth ohu nayakathwa wandanawa nam kisidu adupaduwakin thorawa sidukaranu athi athara, oonama deshapalakayakutama thama anagatha apekshakathwaya udesa ese kirimata kewala kotatasha kumaya magin bala karanu laba atha.manda aasana sanwidhayaka dhura yanu paksha nayakathwayata awashya paridima pathkaranu labana pathkirimak bawini.thama deshapalana pakshaya thula abhyanthara prajathannrawadaya shakthimath kirimata wera darana siyalu dena mepilibadawa siya awadhanaya yomu kalayuthuyayi sithamu.
